verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <WH6030> way·ya·‘an answered: ( Job: Who Can Understand God’s Majesty?) אִיּ֗וֹב <WH347> ’î·yō·wḇ Then Job וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> way·yō·mar ...

מֶה־ <WH4100> meh- “ How עָזַ֥רְתָּ <WH5826> ‘ā·zar·tā you have helped לְלֹא־ <WH3808> lə·lō- the powerless כֹ֑חַ <WH3581> ḵō·aḥ ... ה֝וֹשַׁ֗עְתָּ <WH3467> hō·wō·ša‘·tā [and] saved זְר֣וֹעַ <WH2220> zə·rō·w·a‘ the arm לֹא־ <WH3808> lō- that is feeble עֹֽז׃ <WH5797> ‘ōz ...!

מַה־ <WH4100> mah- How יָּ֭עַצְתָּ <WH3289> yā·‘aṣ·tā you have counseled לְלֹ֣א <WH3808> lə·lō the unwise חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> ḥāḵ·māh ... וְ֝תוּשִׁיָּ֗ה <WH8454> wə·ṯū·šî·yāh insight! לָרֹ֥ב <WH7230> lā·rōḇ fully sound הוֹדָֽעְתָּ׃ <WH3045> hō·w·ḏā·‘ə·tā [and] provided

אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- To מִ֭י <WH4310> mî whom הִגַּ֣דְתָּ <WH5046> hig·gaḏ·tā have you uttered מִלִּ֑ין <WH4405> mil·lîn these words? וְנִשְׁמַת־ <WH5397> wə·niš·maṯ- spirit מִ֝י <WH4310> mî And whose יָצְאָ֥ה <WH3318> yā·ṣə·’āh spoke מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH4480> mim·me·kā through you?

הָרְפָאִ֥ים <WH7496> hā·rə·p̄ā·’îm The dead יְחוֹלָ֑לוּ <WH2342> yə·ḥō·w·lā·lū tremble — מִתַּ֥חַת <WH8478> mit·ta·ḥaṯ those beneath מַ֝֗יִם <WH4325> ma·yim the waters וְשֹׁכְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH7931> wə·šō·ḵə·nê·hem and those who dwell in them.

עָר֣וֹם <WH6174> ‘ā·rō·wm is naked שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> šə·’ō·wl Sheol נֶגְדּ֑וֹ <WH5048> neḡ·dōw before [God], וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> wə·’ên has no כְּ֝ס֗וּת <WH3682> kə·sūṯ covering. לָֽאֲבַדּֽוֹן׃ <WH11> lā·’ă·ḇad·dō·wn and Abaddon ( Abaddon means Destruction.)

נֹטֶ֣ה <WH5186> nō·ṭeh He stretches out צָפ֣וֹן <WH6828> ṣā·p̄ō·wn the north עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- over תֹּ֑הוּ <WH8414> tō·hū empty space; תֹּ֥לֶה <WH8518> tō·leh He hangs אֶ֝֗רֶץ <WH776> ’e·reṣ the earth עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- upon בְּלִי־ <WH1097> bə·lî- nothing מָֽה׃ <WH4100> māh ....

צֹרֵֽר־ <WH6887> ṣō·rêr- He wraps up מַ֥יִם <WH4325> ma·yim the waters בְּעָבָ֑יו <WH5645> bə·‘ā·ḇāw in His clouds, וְלֹא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- do not נִבְקַ֖ע <WH1234> niḇ·qa‘ burst עָנָ֣ן <WH6051> ‘ā·nān yet the clouds תַּחְתָּֽם׃ <WH8478> taḥ·tām under their own weight.

מְאַחֵ֥ז <WH270> mə·’a·ḥêz He covers פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> pə·nê- the face כִסֵּ֑ה <WH3678> ḵis·sêh of the full moon, ( Or of His throne) פַּרְשֵׁ֖ז <WH6576> par·šêz spreading עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> ‘ā·lāw over it עֲנָנֽוֹ׃ <WH6051> ‘ă·nā·nōw His cloud.

חֹֽק־ <WH2706> ḥōq- a horizon חָ֭ג <WH2328> ḥāḡ He has inscribed עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- on פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> pə·nê- the face מָ֑יִם <WH4325> mā·yim of the waters עַד־ <WH5704> ‘aḏ- at תַּכְלִ֖ית <WH8503> taḵ·lîṯ the boundary א֣וֹר <WH216> ’ō·wr light עִם־ <WH5973> ‘im- between חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <WH2822> ḥō·šeḵ and darkness.

עַמּוּדֵ֣י <WH5982> ‘am·mū·ḏê The foundations שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> šā·ma·yim of heaven יְרוֹפָ֑פוּ <WH7322> yə·rō·w·p̄ā·p̄ū quake, וְ֝יִתְמְה֗וּ <WH8539> wə·yiṯ·mə·hū astounded מִגַּעֲרָתֽוֹ׃ <WH1606> mig·ga·‘ă·rā·ṯōw at His rebuke.

בְּ֭כֹחוֹ <WH3581> bə·ḵō·ḥōw By His power רָגַ֣ע <WH7280> rā·ḡa‘ He stirred ( Or stilled) הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> hay·yām the sea; וּבִתוּבְנָתוֹ <WH8394> ū·ḇi·ṯū·ḇə·nå̄·ṯō by His understanding מָ֣חַץ <WH4272> mā·ḥaṣ He shattered רָֽהַב׃ <WH7294> rā·haḇ Rahab.

בְּ֭רוּחוֹ <WH7307> bə·rū·ḥōw By His breath שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> šā·ma·yim the skies שִׁפְרָ֑ה <WH8235> šip̄·rāh were cleared; חֹֽלֲלָ֥ה <WH2490> ḥō·lă·lāh pierced יָ֝ד֗וֹ <WH3027> yā·ḏōw His hand נָחָ֥שׁ <WH5175> nā·ḥāš serpent. ( Hebrew nachash; translated in most cases as snake) בָּרִֽיחַ׃ <WH1281> bā·rî·aḥ the fleeing

הֶן־ <WH2005> hen- Indeed, אֵ֤לֶּה׀ <WH428> ’êl·leh these [are] קְצ֬וֹת <WH7098> qə·ṣō·wṯ but the fringes דַּרְכּוֹ <WH1870> dar·kō of His ways; וּמַה־ <WH4100> ū·mah- how שֵּׁ֣מֶץ <WH8102> šê·meṣ faint דָּ֭בָר <WH1697> dā·ḇār is the whisper נִשְׁמַע־ <WH8085> niš·ma‘- we hear בּ֑וֹ Prep│3ms ( bōw) of Him! וְרַ֥עַם 7482 Conj-w│N-msc ( wə·ra·‘am) the thunder גְּבוּרָתוֹ 1369 N-fpc│3ms ( gə·ḇū·rå̄·ṯō) of His power? ” מִ֣י 4310 Interrog ( mî) Who then יִתְבּוֹנָֽן׃ס 995 V-Hitpael-Imperf-3ms ( yiṯ·bō·w·nān) can understand
